extension.summary: Listen to more music like the one currently playing.
extension.description: Create a 25 item playlist based on currently playing song, this uses the free MusicIP (Amplifind) music analysis tool, available at http://www.amplifindmusicservices.com/what/downloads.php. It expects to have the service running on the localhost on port 10002.
extension.disclaimer: Feel free to use this script. For information visit the wiki.
